response.overview: Astrid has just one friend, her best friend Kristin, who lives in the neighbouring apartment building. She's just found out that Kristin is moving to another city, to a big house. Astrid feels scared of being left alone. She tries to arrange one last fantastic play session together in Kristin's apartment, but it's difficult when everything in the room reminds her that her friend is moving soon. It doesn't help that Kristin wants to play a game where Ken and Barbie buy a new, bigger house.
response.title: Det nye huset
